casebody.data:
Nat RAY, Appellant, v. A. C. ADERHOLD, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 7314. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 16, 1934. In forma pauperis. Nat Ray, of Atlanta, Ga., in pro. per. Lawrence S. Camp, U. S. Atty., and H. T. Nichols, Sp. Atty., both of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before BRYAN, FOSTER, and SIBLEY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

On the authority of Aderhold v. Edwards (C. C. A.) 71 F.(2d) 297, the judgment is affirmed.
